overview: Ooh baby, baby ...  Ooh baby, baby  Sugar, spice and everything nice. Very, VERY nice! In fact, it's smoking. Sin City presents the perfect excuse for self-abuse... JENNA!  She's the girl next door whose naughty fantasies and vivid imagination lead her on a sexual roller coaster ride.  Tag along with one of adult's hottest stars EVER. It's Jenna at her finest, and that's pretty freaking good, baby.
title: Baby Doll
